data.name: AskToUnblock1
data.value: To submit an application, go to your personal account in the 'Statistics' section and click on the 'Submit an application for unlocking' link.

data.name: AskToUnblock2
data.value: You can also apply for unblocking through the contact form on the main page, indicating in the subject line 'Account unblocking' and your mail.

data.name: AskToUnblock3
data.value: Consideration of the application takes some time. If the application is considered positively, you will receive a message on successful unlocking to the mail you specified during registration, if negative, you will receive a message about the reason.

data.name: AskToUnblockLabel
data.value: Account Unblocking Application Rules

data.name: Info1
data.value: ALUTECH Group of Companies is a large production and sales holding with a 22-year history. One of the market leaders for roller shutter systems and sectional doors in Western and Eastern Europe, a leading manufacturer of aluminum profile systems in the CIS.

data.name: Info10
data.value: The impressive production capacity allows the production of profiles, components and control systems for roller shutters.

data.name: Info11
data.value: Alumin Techno

data.name: Info12
data.value: An innovative production, powder coating and anodizing of aluminum profiles, which has become the largest in the CIS.

data.name: Info13
data.value: The oldest line of activity of the ALUTECH Group of Companies is the production of roller shutters. They are made from energy efficient foam filled or heavy duty extruded profiles. To protect the house from insects, poplar fluff and dust, roller shutters with a built-in mosquito net are provided.

data.name: Info14
data.value: In addition, the holding's assortment includes roller shutters that are installed in garages and parking lots, as well as roller shutters for boutiques and shopping centers. For facilities with increased security requirements, ALUTECH offers roller shutters with P5 burglar resistance class.

data.name: Info15
data.value: Sectional doors are in high demand. Among the models for installation in private garages, you can find budget and premium series. Industrial doors are also presented in different price categories. They are suitable for installation in service stations, agricultural enterprises, etc. Panoramic gates are perfect for car dealerships and hi-tech objects.

data.name: Info16
data.value: ALUTECH Group of Companies offers various products of the entry group. Among them are sliding and swing gates, wickets and fencing sections. Our own production guarantees the high quality of these products. The compatibility of products with the exterior of any object is ensured through a wide selection of filling options. Among them are sandwich panels, aluminum profiles, roller shutter profiles and combinations of these materials.

data.name: Info17
data.value: To ensure comfortable and safe control of security systems, ALUTECH offers its own line of conceptual automatics for roller shutters, sectional and entrance gates, as well as automatic barriers with high intensity of work to regulate the passage to private territory.

data.name: Info18
data.value: To improve the efficiency of the warehouse and logistics centers, the production of modern handling equipment has been launched.

data.name: Info19
data.value: For the implementation of interior and architectural projects, the holding offers aluminum profile systems.

data.name: Info2
data.value: The largest plants of the holding are located in Minsk:

data.name: Info3
data.value: Alutech door systems

data.name: Info4
data.value: Alutech Incorporated

data.name: Info5
data.value: Alumin Techno

data.name: Info6
data.value: Alutech door systems

data.name: Info7
data.value: The main activity is the production of sectional doors. The enterprise is capable of producing about 670 items per day.

data.name: Info8
data.value: It also manufactures sandwich panels, components and products from aluminum alloys by injection molding.

data.name: Info9
data.value: Alutech Incorporated

data.name: InfoLabel
data.value: About the ALUTECH Group of Companies

data.name: MarksRules1
data.value: Each product is rated on a scale from 1 to 10.

data.name: MarksRules2
data.value: Each product can be rated by one user only 1 time.

data.name: MarksRules3
data.value: You can delete your rating and re-rate the item.

data.name: MarksRules4
data.value: A blocked user cannot rate products.

data.name: MarksRulesCaption
data.value: Product valuation rules

data.name: MessagesRules1
data.value: When sending a message, it is mandatory to indicate your name, mail, phone number and message text.

data.name: MessagesRules2
data.value: Pay attention! The answer to your message will come exactly to the mail that you indicated in the form when sending messages.

data.name: MessagesRulesCaption
data.value: Rules for sending messages to the administration

data.name: PurchasesRules1
data.value: You can buy any product an unlimited number of times.

data.name: PurchasesRules2
data.value: You can buy only the maximum quantity of goods that is in stock. We are currently working on the implementation of pre-orders in our store.

data.name: PurchasesRules3
data.value: The minimum number of items to purchase is 1.

data.name: PurchasesRules4
data.value: Funds are credited to the bonus account only after the administrator confirms the payment for the order.

data.name: PurchasesRules5
data.value: The amount to be credited to the bonus depends on the value of your order (you can see it when placing an order in the section 'Bonus account').

data.name: PurchasesRules6
data.value: Before debiting funds from your bonus account, make sure that your order has taken the final form. When funds are debited from the bonus account and the subsequent editing of the order, the funds from the bonus account will disappear.

data.name: PurchasesRules7
data.value: When placing an order, the required fields are contact name, phone number and email.

data.name: PurchasesRules8
data.value: After placing an order and sending it to us, you will not be able to edit it, but you can cancel it by sending your order ID to us through the contact form on the main page for cancellation. The ID of your order can be found in your personal account in the 'My orders' section.

data.name: PurchasesRulesCaption
data.value: Rules for the purchase of goods

data.name: ReviewsRules1
data.value: Reviews can be written an unlimited number of times for any product.

data.name: ReviewsRules2
data.value: It is prohibited in reviews: obscene language, spam, any kind of insult, any kind of discord.

data.name: ReviewsRules3
data.value: For violation of the rules - blocking.

data.name: ReviewsRules4
data.value: A blocked user cannot write reviews.

data.name: ReviewsRulesCaption
data.value: Rules for writing reviews
